oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Check-Block-02: Are strict permissions set for cinder config files?
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: This test makes sure that /etc/cinder/ has mode 0640. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

service sssd is not configured to start

Property FragmentPath of service sssd is set to /dev/null

oval-def:criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service syslog is masked
Property FragmentPath of service syslog is set to /dev/null

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: No CD/DVD drive is configured to automount in /etc/fstab
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check the /etc/fstab and check if a CD/DVD drive is not configured for automount.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if CD/DVD drive is not configured to automout in /etc/fstab

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for different architecture than s390x
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not s390x

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Device Files for Removable Media Partitions Does Not Exist on the System
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Verify if device file representing removable partitions exist on the system

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if removable partition really exists on the system

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: SSHD is not required to be installed or requirement not set
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: If SSHD is not required, we check it is not installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH not required or not set

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: SSHD is required to be installed or requirement not set
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: If SSHD is required, we check it is installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH required or not set

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: It doesn't matter if sshd is installed or not
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Test if value sshd_required is 0.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: OpenSSH Server is 7.4 or newer
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if version of OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

oval-def:criteria.comment: OpenSSH Server version is equal or higher than 7.4

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify The SSSD Configuration File Exists
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/sssd/sssd.conf file should exist if it is in use.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: SSSD is configured to use LDAP
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

oval-def:criterion.comment: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Non-UEFI system boot mode check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if System boot mode is non-UEFI.

oval-def:extend_definition.comment: Pass if System boot mode is non-UEFI

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: UEFI system boot mode check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for 64-bit Architecture
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Generic test for 64-bit architectures to be used by other tests

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for aarch_64 Architecture
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Generic test for aarch_64 architecture to be used by other tests

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for PPC and PPCLE Architecture
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Generic test for PPC PPC64LE architecture to be used by other tests

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for s390_64 Architecture
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Generic test for s390_64 architecture to be used by other tests

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for x86 Architecture
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Generic test for x86 architecture to be used by other tests

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Test for x86_64 Architecture
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Generic test for x86_64 architecture to be used by other tests

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Check that file storing USBGuard rules exists and is not empty
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check that file storing USBGuard rules at /etc/usbguard/rules.conf exists and is not empty

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check that file storing USBGuard rules exists and is not empty

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check that the usbguard rules in either /etc/usbguard/rules.conf or /etc/usbguard/rules.d/ contain at least one non white space character.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Value of 'var_accounts_user_umask' variable represented as octal number
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Value of 'var_accounts_user_umask' variable represented as octal number

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Value of 'var_removable_partition' variable is set to '/dev/cdrom'
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Verify if value of 'var_removable_partition' variable is set to '/dev/cdrom'

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if removable partition value represents CD/DVD drive

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Value of 'var_umask_for_daemons' variable represented as octal number
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Value of 'var_umask_for_daemons' variable represented as octal number

linux:systemdunitproperty_test.comment: Test that the sssd service is not running
Test that the property LoadState from the service sssd is masked
Test that the property FragmentPath from the service sssd is set to /dev/null
Test that the syslog service is not running
Test that the property LoadState from the service syslog is masked
Test that the property FragmentPath from the service syslog is set to /dev/null

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: check the configuration of /etc/pam.d/system-auth
check the configuration of /etc/pam.d/system-auth
audit auditctl
audit augenrules
audit augenrules 32-bit setdomainname
audit augenrules 64-bit setdomainname

audit auditctl 64-bit setdomainname
audit augenrules 32-bit sethostname
audit augenrules 64-bit sethostname
audit auditctl 32-bit sethostname
audit auditctl 64-bit sethostname
log_group = root

Check os-release VERSION_ID

Check the usbguard rules in either /etc/usbguard/rules.conf or /etc/usbguard/rules.d/ contain at least one non whitespace character and exists

oval-def:external_variable.comment: May be defined by Profiles to explicitly say if sshd is required or not
Value of var_accounts_user_umask (the required umask) as string

oval-def:local_variable.comment: First octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask
Second octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask
Third octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask
var_accounts_user_umask umask converted from string to a number
